title: Random Disconnects
body: I just got d/c'd from a ranked game. it said trying to reconnect. my internet was fine as i could start new youtube video. i x'd out of the game. to only see that the the game is over and there is no record of the game in my history. it just took me straight to lobby, idk what happened or if the match is still going.

replies.body: Your internet might be fine, but you can still run into problems reaching specific services like the game server.  It sounds like this particular match resulted in a remake.  My suggestion here would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is causing the hiccup in the first place.  I highly recommend doing this in a custom game for now though, so you don't get penalized for leaving or losing a ranked game as a result.  Let me know if that clears things up!
